Title: Dance Back from the Grave
Writer: Julie Plec (created by), Michael Russo, Michael Narducci, Michelle Paradise (executive story editor), Charlie Charbonneau (story editor), L.J. Smith (based in part on the character Klaus from "The Vampire Diaries" novels by), Marguerite MacIntyre (staff writer)
Actors: Joseph Morgan, Daniel Gillies, Claire Holt, Phoebe Tonkin
Plot: Marcel, still angered refuses to help Klaus when a gruesome discovery is made. Rebekah is on alert when she uncovers the remnants of a sacrifice down by the docks realizing it's the work of...
